p: Ah Gow, Ah Chong, Ah Lum, Lum Cuoy, Chung Chang, Ling Long, Gen Chock, Ah Woo, Say Suoy, Ah John, Ah Chuck, Ah See, Ah Gong, Ah Hong, Gee Chong, Hong Kong, Ah Chuy, Ah Hay, Wing Gay, Sin Wah, Ah Poy, Chen Yook, Lum Hong, Ah Win, Ah Nam, Ah Suoy, Chung Greng, Chew Ming, and Ah Wai, being duly and severally sworn, each for himself and not one for the other, deposes and says:
That he is a petitioner named in the foregoing petition which is signed by his attorneys on his behalf;
That he has heard the said petition read, knows the contents thereof, and the statements therein made are true, as he verily believes.
